courseDetails.title: CyberSecurity Bootcamp: The Ultimate Beginner's Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Knowledge that everyone must have. Learn how to protect your personal data from hackers. Take cyber security seriously.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you know what is the biggest threat in Cyber Security? The humans, it is so obvious. It’s all of us. The majority of security britches are actually being driven through social engineering and human interaction. Because we individually and collectively, just not taking cybersecurity seriously. We don’t know how to prevent the risks, the threats and vulnerabilities that exist in our behaviors and habits. We don’t have enough knowledge and training. We don’t teach ourselves to behave correctly when we use computers and electronic devices.

We must be aware of the correct simple things we need to do. Like best practices and general cybersecurity simple rules. And when we don’t do this, we open our doors widely for unauthorized access to our personal information to anyone. If we just know how to not do silly things and do things that can lead to compromise. We are all going to be more secure.

This is what our course is all about. We will show how easy it is to follow just a few simple cybersecurity practices. That will keep your personal information safe from unauthorized access and will keep you away from troubles.

The purpose of this course is to help you understand how to protect the personal data you have recorded on your computers, laptops and mobile devices. You will understand what the best practices are. How simple it is to secure your devices. And how this can prevent attacks and make your devices more secure.

You will learn what Social Engineering is and how the hackers are using it. Why must you keep your software always updated. What is the advantage of using strong passwords and password managers? You will understand why it’s important to enable 2FA/MFA for all your accounts. Also, what is device encryption, why you need it and how it protects you. Why you should avoid using public Wi-Fi and how VPN can protect you.

Why you must use antivirus software, from what attacks it can protect you. How to be cautious and how to prevent data breaches of your personal data and identity.

We will explain you what Malware is and its types:

- Trojan Horse

- Adware

- Spyware

- Browser Hijacking

- Virus

- Worms

- Scareware

You will learn how to recognize phishing emails, how to browse safely, and communicate securely.

At the end of the course you will know how to protect your electronic devices. You know the meaning of the main cybersecurity threats and terminology and how to recognize them.

We have created a course for everyone who uses some kind of electronic device, uses the internet and wants to protect his personal data or learn more about the Cybersecurity threat.

The terminology is simply explained with interactive professional videos and examples.

Don’t wait, take this course and educate yourself. Educating yourself and others — is by far the most effective defense you can do against all faces of Cyber Attacks.

Start your Security Awareness training now. Take Cyber Security seriously.
targetAudiences: Everyone who is using electronic devices like computers, laptops and mobile phones.
Everyone who wants to know how to protect his personal data.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our comprehensive course on mastering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. In this course, you will acquire the skills you need to construct modern and responsive web applications by creating entertaining and engaging projects.

Our course is suitable for both beginners and experienced programmers. Whether you’re new to coding or looking to refresh your skills, our course is perfect for you.

We believe that learning should be enjoyable and engaging, which is why we’ve created an array of modern, super-cool, and captivating projects that you will develop throughout the course. Each project is created independently from scratch, and you can choose which ones to work on based on your interests.

Our course features separate videos for each technology, enabling you to learn and focus on the areas that interest you the most. For instance, if you’re primarily interested in JavaScript, you can skip the HTML and CSS sections and dive right into the JavaScript videos.

I’m Vijay Kumar, a web developer with over 8 years of experience. I’ll be your guide throughout the course, answering any questions you may have and providing valuable feedback to help you become a proficient web developer.


NOTE: This course is Recorded in Hindi Language! and the Subtitle is auto-generated.


Are you ready to immerse yourself in the exciting world of web development? Join us today and start building astonishing websites!


  1. Internet Status Checker: This project checks the online status of the user's device using JavaScript. The result is displayed on an HTML page styled with CSS. The project uses the navigator. Online property to check the online status of the user's device. If the device is online, the project displays the text "Online" on the page. If the device is offline, the project displays the text "Offline" on the page.

  2. Palindrome Checker: This project checks if a given string is a palindrome using JavaScript. The user inputs the string through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses a recursive function to check if the string is a palindrome. The function starts at the beginning and end of the string and compares the characters at each index. If the characters are the same, the function continues to the next index. If the characters are not the same, the function returns false.

  3. RGB Color Generator: This project generates random RGB (red, green, blue) color values using JavaScript. The generated color is displayed on an HTML page, with the background color changing to the generated color. The page can be styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. random() function to generate random numbers between 0 and 255. The three random numbers are used to create an RGB color value. The color value is then used to change the background color of the page.

  4. Counter Application: This project is a simple counter application that uses JavaScript to increment and decrement a count value. The count value is displayed on an HTML page and buttons can be added to increment and decrement the count. The page can be styled with CSS. The project uses two variables to store the count value and the button click event handlers to increment and decrement the count value. The count value is then displayed on the page.

  5. ASCII and Unicode Character Detector: This project uses JavaScript to detect whether a given character is an ASCII or Unicode character. The user inputs the character through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses the String.fromCharCode() function to convert the character to a string. The charCodeAt() function is then used to get the ASCII code of the character. If the ASCII code is between 0 and 127, the character is an ASCII character. Otherwise, the character is a Unicode character.

  6. Analog Clock Application: This project displays an analog clock with the current time on an HTML page using JavaScript. The clock is created using CSS to style the clock's face and hands. The project uses the Date() object to get the current time. The current time is then used to set the position of the clock's hands.

  7. Random Color Generator: This project generates random colors in any format (e.g. RGB, HEX, HSL) using JavaScript. The generated color is displayed on an HTML page, with the background color changing to the generated color. The page can be styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. random() function to generate random numbers between 0 and 255. The three random numbers are used to create an RGB color value. The color value is then converted to the desired format and displayed on the page.

  8. BMI Calculator Application: This project calculates the user's body mass index (BMI) based on their height and weight using JavaScript. The user inputs their height and weight through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. round() function to round the BMI value to two decimal places. The BMI value is then displayed on the page.

  9. Loan Calculator: This project calculates the monthly payment and total interest for a loan based on the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term using JavaScript. The user inputs these values through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. pow() function to calculate the monthly payment. The monthly payment is then multiplied by the loan term to calculate the total interest. The total interest is then displayed on the page.

  10. Love Calculator: This project calculates a "love percentage" between two people based on their names using JavaScript. The user inputs their names through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses a simple algorithm to calculate the love percentage. The algorithm adds up the number of letters in each name and then divides the sum by 2. The love percentage is then displayed on the page.

NOTE: This course is Recorded in Hindi Language! and the Subtitle is auto-generated.

courseDetails.title: Competency-Based Interview: Structured Behavioral Questions
courseDetails.shortDescription: Hiring Techniques | Recruitment | STAR | Talent Assessment | PARLA | CARE | Predictive Hiring | Checking references
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering Competency-Based Behavioral Interviews


Course Description:


Hiring the right talent is one of the most critical aspects of building a high-performing organization. Competency-based behavioral interviews help hiring managers, recruiters, and HR professionals assess candidates effectively by focusing on past experiences and demonstrated skills. This course is designed to equip you with the knowledge, techniques, and tools needed to conduct structured, competency-based interviews that lead to better hiring decisions.


Through practical case studies, real-world examples, and interview simulations, you’ll learn how to identify key competencies, structure behavioral interview questions, and evaluate candidate responses using a scoring system. Whether you are an HR professional, hiring manager, or recruiter, this course will enhance your interviewing skills and ensure you select the best-fit candidates for your organization.

What You’ll Learn:


The Fundamentals of Competency-Based Interviews – Understand the principles behind behavioral interviewing and how it improves hiring accuracy.


Developing a Competency Model – Learn how to define core competencies for different job roles and integrate them into the hiring process.


Crafting Effective Behavioral Interview Questions – Master the STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result) method and other structured interview techniques.


Evaluating Candidates Objectively – Implement competency-based scoring rubrics and minimize bias in the selection process.


Avoiding Common Interviewing Mistakes – Identify biases, pitfalls, and ineffective questioning methods that can lead to poor hiring decisions.


Improving Hiring Decisions with Data – Leverage competency frameworks, assessment grids, and interview scorecards for better decision-making.

Course Program:


1. Introduction to Competency-Based Interviews


• The role of behavioral and competency-based interviews in modern recruitment

• Why past behavior predicts future performance

• Difference between structured and unstructured interviews


2. Developing a Competency Model for Hiring


• Understanding competency frameworks

• Identifying technical vs. soft skills competencies

• Customizing competency models for different roles


3. Crafting Effective Behavioral Interview Questions


• Writing open-ended, behavioral interview questions

• Using the STAR method to structure candidate responses

• Common mistakes in formulating competency-based questions


4. The Interview Process: Structuring & Conducting Effective Interviews


• Best practices for planning and structuring interviews

• Conducting panel interviews using a competency-based approach

• Ensuring fairness and consistency in the hiring process


5. Competency-Based Candidate Evaluation & Decision-Making


• Designing scoring matrices for competency assessments

• Using interview scorecards for structured decision-making

• Avoiding unconscious bias in candidate evaluations


6. Improving Hiring Success with Competency-Based Interviewing


• Case studies of companies using competency-based selection

• Implementing behavioral interview training in your company

• Measuring the impact of structured hiring on talent acquisition

Who Should Take This Course?


HR professionals & recruiters looking to refine their interview process and hire high-quality candidates.


Hiring managers seeking structured, data-driven methods to evaluate candidates more effectively.


Talent acquisition specialists aiming to implement competency-based hiring frameworks.


Business leaders & team leads involved in the selection of key employees.

Why Enroll in This Course?


Learn from Industry Experts – Gain insights from experienced HR leaders and recruiters.


Practical & Actionable Knowledge – Real-life examples, downloadable templates, and interview scripts.


Step-by-Step Training – From question design to evaluation scoring, master every aspect of behavioral interviews.


Certificate of Completion – Validate your expertise in competency-based hiring.

Improve your hiring accuracy and reduce turnover by mastering behavioral, competency-based interviewing!


Enroll now and start conducting structured, effective interviews today!
targetAudiences: This course is ideal for recruiters, hiring managers, and HR professionals looking to enhance their interviewing and candidate assessment skills, as well as those new to competency-based recruitment practices.

SiteGround proporciona servicios de alojamiento web para sitios web de WordPress , Joomla , Magento , Drupal , PrestaShop y WooCommerce.


El servicio de hosting de SiteGround ofrece planes para cualquier tipo de web que tengas en mente.


SiteGround es un hosting multiservicio ampliamente recomendable para cualquier proyecto. Además de hosting, gestiona dominio, webmail, y otros servicios relacionados. Tiene un completo y profesional soporte técnico y atención al cliente dispuesto a atenderte.


¿QUÉ ES SITEGROUND MIGRATOR?


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.

Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.


¿QUÉ ES SECURITY OPTIMIZER?


Security Optimizer es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround para proteger un sitio web de WordPress y prevenir una serie de amenazas como ataques de fuerza bruta, inicios de sesión comprometidos, fugas de datos y más.


El plugin ofrece características como:

  • Evitar el malware común.

  • Defenderte contra los ataques de fuerza bruta.

  • Añadir protección XSS avanzada para proteger carpetas críticas y que no se inyecten archivos maliciosos.

  • Ocultar tu versión de WordPress.

  • Eliminar el archivo readme.txt predeterminado.

  • Proteger el inicio de sesión.

  • Habilitar verificación en dos pasos (con Google Authenticator).

  • Cambiar la URL de inicio de sesión.

  • Impedir usar «admin» como nombre de usuario.

  • Las actividades quedan registradas en el Activity log y además facilita funciones para reaccionar ante posibles ataques desde la sección «Acciones después de un hackeo» para:

    • Cerrar sesión automáticamente a todos los usuarios.

    • Obligar a cambiar las contraseñas.

    • Reinstalar todos tus plugins.


¿QUÉ ES SPEED OPTIMIZER?


Speed Optimizer es un plugin todo en uno para mejorar el rendimiento de WordPress, diseñado y desarrollado por SiteGround. Este plugin tiene todas las funcionalidades que necesitarás para asegurarse de que tu sitio de WordPress funcione de la mejor manera, sin importar en qué plataforma de hosting esté alojado.


Características esenciales del plugin para aumentar la velocidad:

  • Potente caché para tener una web hasta un 20% más rápida.

  • Optimizaciones de portada para minimizar el JS, HTML y CSS, reduciendo el tiempo de espera debido al número de scripts y caracteres de tu código.

  • Optimizaciones de medios para comprimir hasta un 85% el tamaño de las imágenes sin sacrificar la calidad.

  • Optimizaciones del entorno WordPress para optimizar el uso y la eficiencia de los recursos de tu sitio WordPress.

  • Prueba de velocidad y consejos para obtener consejos de optimización a la carta para que tu sitio sea aún más rápido.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos aprenderemos a usar y configurar los diversos plugins de WordPress para SiteGround, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá más herramientas y funciones extras para su sitio web.


¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting en SiteGround.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Professional Certificate in Regulatory Compliance by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 485 000 students.


By the end of this course, you will have a thorough understanding of the regulatory environment in which banking institutions operate globally and the tools needed to ensure compliance. This knowledge will empower you to navigate the complexities of regulatory compliance confidently and effectively.

In addition to these theoretical insights, you will gain practical knowledge crucial for a career in compliance area. You will be able to identify red flags as a real compliance officer, with the skills needed to detect and address potential compliance issues proactively.


Do you want to build a global career at the Wealth Management, Private Banking and Compliance?

Join our new course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Agenda

  • Regulatory Frameworks and Compliance Standards in a Nutshell

  • Key Requirements faced by Banking Institutions

  • Why Compliance Matters? Consequences of Non-Compliance

  • Methods of Risk Mitigation and Prevention of Compliance Violations

  • Emerging Trends and Future Outlook in Regulatory Compliance


Regulatory Compliance refers to an organization's adherence to laws, regulations, guidelines, and specifications relevant to its business processes. These rules can be external (governmental, industry-specific) or internal (company policies).


Importance of Developing Regulatory Compliance Skills for Managers and Companies:

1. Risk Mitigation:

  • Legal and Financial Penalties: Non-compliance can lead to hefty fines, lawsuits, and even criminal charges for managers. By understanding regulations, managers can proactively identify potential risks and ensure compliance, thus safeguarding their companies' financial health.

  • Reputational Damage: Regulatory violations can tarnish a company's reputation, leading to loss of customer trust, decreased sales, and difficulty attracting investors. A manager skilled in compliance can prevent such scenarios.

  • Operational Disruptions: Non-compliance can lead to business interruptions or shutdowns. Managers with a strong compliance background can ensure smooth operations by implementing effective controls and procedures.


2. Strategic Advantage:

  • Competitive Edge: Companies with robust compliance programs are often viewed as more reliable and trustworthy by customers and partners. This can translate to increased business opportunities and market share.

  • Innovation: A deep understanding of regulatory landscapes can help managers identify opportunities for innovative products or services that meet emerging compliance requirements.

  • Investor Confidence: Investors are more likely to invest in companies with strong compliance records, as it demonstrates responsible management and reduces investment risk.


3. Career Advancement for Managers:

  • Increased Employability: Regulatory compliance is a sought-after skill set across industries. Managers who possess this expertise are highly valued and have a broader range of career opportunities.

  • Leadership Roles: Compliance often involves cross-functional collaboration and strategic decision-making, making it an excellent stepping stone to senior management positions.

  • Personal Growth: Staying updated on complex regulations requires continuous learning, which contributes to professional development and enhances a manager's overall skillset.


4. Ethical and Social Responsibility:

  • Protecting Consumers and Employees: Compliance with regulations ensures that products, services, and workplaces are safe for consumers and employees.

  • Sustainability: Many regulations address environmental concerns. Complying with these rules demonstrates a commitment to sustainability and corporate social responsibility.


Developing skills in regulatory compliance is not just a matter of following rules. It's about understanding the broader impact of regulations on businesses and society. By mastering this field, managers can protect their companies, advance their careers, and contribute to a safer and more sustainable business environment.

courseDetails.longDescription:
The Power HR course is an extensive online program designed to provide HR professionals with a comprehensive understanding of all facets of human resources management. Led by industry expert Mike Pritula, this course encompasses 76 informative webinars across five key modules: Power Strategy, Power Recruiting, Power Talent Management, Power Motivation, and Power Troubleshooting. By completing this course, participants will gain in-depth knowledge and practical skills to become true HR experts.


What you’ll learn:

• Strategic HR Management: Develop and implement effective HR strategies aligned with organizational goals, including HR audits, budgeting, analytics, and process automation.

• Recruitment and Sourcing: Master advanced recruitment techniques, including candidate sourcing, Boolean search, social media recruitment, and employer branding to attract top talent.

• Talent Management: Enhance employee performance through effective adaptation programs, OKR systems, coaching, feedback, performance appraisals, and development plans.

• Employee Motivation and Engagement: Implement strategies to boost employee motivation, loyalty, engagement, and well-being, including total rewards concepts, salary management, and recognition programs.

• HR Troubleshooting and Business Partnership: Address complex HR challenges such as employee retention, team building, organizational development, change management, and working with remote employees.


Course Program Overview:

1. Power Strategy (11 hours): Covers strategic HR issues, including HR competency models, audits, strategy development, budgeting, analytics, and process automation.

2. Power Recruiting and Sourcing (17 hours): Focuses on recruitment preparation, candidate search techniques, sourcing tools, interviewing, employer branding, and HR marketing.

3. Power Talent Management (13 hours): Addresses employee adaptation, OKR systems, coaching, feedback, performance appraisals, competence assessment, and mentorship.

4. Power Motivation (19 hours): Explores people management, internal communications, employee motivation, engagement, experience, well-being, and compensation management.

5. Power Troubleshooting (16 hours): Deals with employee dismissal, retention, teamwork, project management, organizational development, change management, and HR trends.

courseDetails.title: Nutritional Insights- Mastering Healthy Eating Habits
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock the Secrets of Balanced Eating and Sustainable Nutrition Practices
courseDetails.longDescription:
The basis of a good existence is a balanced diet.

Comprising the fundamentals of nutrition, demystifying difficult food choices, and assisting you in developing a better connection with food, "Nutritional Insights: Mastering Healthy Eating Habits" is a thorough interactive course meant to lead you through.
This course offers scientifically supported, simple-to-use daily life techniques, whether your goal is to learn a basic knowledge of food types or investigate mindful eating practices.

We will cover everything from determining basic nutrients to creating balanced meals and creating reasonable dietary goals through engaging and interactive videos and lessons.
You will learn about macronutrients and micronutrients, how to decipher food labels, and an understanding of portion control.
This course explores the psychological elements influencing our eating behaviour and how to apply mindful eating techniques, therefore transcending simple nutrition. Understanding emotional triggers and creating conscious plans can help you pay attention to your body and choose foods deliberately.

Apart from fundamental knowledge, useful tools such as grocery shopping advice and meal planning forms will enable you to apply what you discover. You will also look at worldwide dietary trends stressing a range of cuisines and flavours, including Asian and Mediterranean diets.
This course helps you to apply nutritional science to your particular diet and way of living. These ideas will help you design meals that support your emotional and physical health, thereby ensuring that nutrition becomes a sustainable aspect of your life.

Take charge of your eating patterns and create a sustainable, balanced diet fit for your aims for health.

By the end, you will be confident and knowledgeable enough to choose foods wisely, promote your wellness, and savour the advantages of a healthy, nouraging way of life.
This course acts as a useful manual for turning information into enduring behaviours fit for your changing circumstances. Starting your path to becoming a master in healthy eating right now with advice that is approachable, practical, and quite motivating.
targetAudiences: Beginners in nutrition and individuals interested in healthy eating.
Those looking to improve or build sustainable dietary habits.
Health enthusiasts aiming to enhance their understanding of food and nutrition.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Corporate Values | Mission & Vision | Workplace | Leadership | Google | Netflix | Innovation | Apple | Facebook | Miro
courseDetails.longDescription:
Corporate Culture: Building a Foundation for Business Success

Course Description:


In today’s competitive business landscape, a strong corporate culture is essential for driving organizational success and employee engagement. The Corporate Culture course is meticulously designed to equip HR professionals, managers, and business leaders with the knowledge and tools to shape and manage an effective corporate culture. Led by industry expert Mike Pritula, this comprehensive program delves into the eight-step model for building corporate culture, strategies for implementation, and best practices from leading companies such as Netflix, Google, Buffer, Basecamp, Starbucks, and Miro.


What You’ll Learn:

• Understanding Company Culture: Gain insights into the importance of corporate culture in business and how it originates and evolves within organizations.

• The Eight-Step Model: Learn a structured approach to building corporate culture, including describing desired employee behaviors, creating rituals, selecting culturally aligned talent, integrating newcomers, and continuous communication.

• Implementing Culture in Daily Operations: Discover practical methods to embed culture into everyday business practices, from recruitment to performance management.

• Communicating and Training: Develop strategies for effectively communicating cultural values and training employees to embody them.

• Measuring and Sustaining Culture: Explore tools and techniques to assess cultural alignment and sustain a positive corporate environment over time.


Who Should Enroll:

• HR Professionals seeking to develop and manage corporate culture within their organizations.

• Managers and Team Leaders aiming to foster a cohesive and motivated team environment.

• Business Leaders and Entrepreneurs interested in establishing a strong cultural foundation to drive business success.

• Organizational Development Specialists looking to enhance their expertise in cultural transformation initiatives.


Course Structure:

The program comprises 6 comprehensive lessons, each focusing on critical aspects of corporate culture development and management. Lessons are released weekly, allowing participants to progressively build their expertise. Each session includes recorded classes, practical assignments, and personalized feedback to ensure the application of learned concepts.


Key Modules:

1. What is Company Culture

• The significance of culture in business.

courseDetails.title: Dementia Care: Delaying Progress and Supporting Families
courseDetails.shortDescription: Comprehensive Techniques to Enhance Caregiving, Improve Quality of Life, and Support Loved Ones with Dementia.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Dementia is a growing global concern, affecting millions of individuals and their families every year. This interactive course, Dementia Care: Delaying Progress and Supporting Families, is designed to provide comprehensive tools and strategies for anyone involved in dementia care. Whether you're a family caregiver, a professional healthcare worker, or someone preparing to engage in elder care services, this course offers valuable insights and actionable techniques to make a difference.

The course begins with the Fundamentals of Dementia, where you'll learn about the condition's nature, the types, and the stages. We emphasise understanding the psychological and emotional impacts of dementia on both the patient and their loved ones. By fostering this foundational knowledge, students can better appreciate the challenges involved and develop a compassionate approach to care.

Next, we delve into Risk Factors and Preventative Strategies. This module explores genetic and environmental risks while providing lifestyle recommendations to delay the progression of dementia. These preventative strategies are designed to empower caregivers and patients to live healthier lives, even in the face of challenges.

Daily caregiving can feel overwhelming, but in Daily Activities and Social Skills, you'll learn to design meaningful activities that stimulate cognitive and social engagement. You'll also explore the critical role of routine in reducing anxiety and fostering a sense of security for dementia patients.

Effective communication is essential in dementia care. In the Communication and Legal Considerations module, you’ll gain skills for empathetic communication, understand non-verbal cues, and navigate ethical dilemmas and legal considerations. This module ensures you are well-prepared to support both the patient and their family with dignity and respect.

Our course is not just informative; it’s actionable. At the end of each module, you’ll take quizzes to reinforce your understanding. By the conclusion, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge and confidence to provide exceptional care.

Join us and transform your caregiving journey. Let’s work together to enhance the lives of those affected by dementia.
targetAudiences: Beginners in caregiving seeking foundational knowledge.
Social workers, family counselors and other professionals aiming to refine their dementia care strategies.
Healthcare professionals working with dementia patients.
Families members or friends seeking guidance on managing and supporting someone with dementia at home.
Students pursuing studies in healthcare or elder care fields (psychology, nursing, or gerontology).

courseDetails.title: Crea un MarketPlace Multi Vendedor con WordPress y Dokan
courseDetails.shortDescription: Genera ingresos creando tu propio Marketplace Multi Vendedor al estilo de Amazon o Mercado Libre.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UN MARKETPLACE MULTIVENDEDOR CON WORPDRESS, WOOCOMMERCE Y DOKAN PARA GENERAR INGRESOS CON MÚLTIPLES TIENDAS DESDE UN MISMO LUGAR?

El Marketplace se refiere a un concepto más amplio de ventas online. En esta plataforma, diferentes tiendas pueden anunciar sus productos, ofreciéndole de esa forma, un abanico de opciones al cliente.

El concepto de Marketplace no es nuevo. En América Latina surgió en 2012 y, hoy en día, muchas grandes empresas digitales ya se han adherido. Algunos ejemplos de Marketplace son Amazon, Google Shopping y Mercado Libre.

Como ya dijimos existen varias diferencias entre un Marketplace y un E-Commerce.

En el caso de un E-Commerce, entras en el sitio web de una tienda X y eliges un producto que es vendido y enviado por la propia tienda.

En el caso de un Marketplace puedes entrar en el sitio web de la tienda X y elegir un producto que está siendo vendido y enviado por la tienda Y.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


¿QUÉ ES WOOCOMMERCE?

WooCommerce es un plugin (complemento) de WordPress que permite implementar una tienda online totalmente funcional en una web.

Este plugin incluye todo lo necesario para empezar a vender en línea:

Las páginas de tienda, carrito, mi cuenta y finalizar compra, los métodos de pago más utilizados en el mundo (transferencia bancaria, PayPal y Stripe), un sistema para configurar diferentes tipos de impuestos y gastos de envío por zonas, etc.

Por supuesto, también permite la subida de un número ilimitado de productos para su venta, pudiendo añadir su precio, descripciones (una corta y una larga), variaciones del mismo, etc.

En definitiva, WooCommerce es una de las mejores opciones que existen para crear una tienda online.


¿QUÉ ES DOKAN?

Dokan es un complemento de múltiples proveedores para WordPress diseñado para ayudar a los proveedores a personalizar las tiendas y administrar el inventario de productos desde una plataforma unificada.

Proporciona una solución completa multivendedor para crear un marketplace con WooCommerce. Su diseño e interfaz súper intuitivos hacen la configuración y gestión de la tienda multivendedor muy sencilla, incluso para principiantes. Su automatización es tan completa que prácticamente sólo tendrás que revisar los pedidos

En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un Marketplace Multi Vendedor, utilizando la plataforma de WordPress y los plugins de WooCommerce y Dokan que nos brindará todas las funciones y opciones necesarias para crear y diseñar nuestro Marketplace Multi Vendedor, que llevarán su negocio a un siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su Marketplace Multi Vendedor con WordPress, WooCommerce y Dokan, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su Marketplace Multi Vendedor diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs

Descubra como funcionam os GPTs, essas miniaplicações hiperespecializadas que podem, às vezes, superar o ChatGPT. Aprenda a criar seu próprio GPT passo a passo. Domine as chamadas de API para maximizar as capacidades do ChatGPT e, ao final da seção, descubra como monetizar seus GPTs e, mais amplamente, como ganhar dinheiro com o ChatGPT.

Gestão de API & Playground

Explore o playground do ChatGPT e descubra as novas funcionalidades que ele oferece. Aprenda a chamar a API do ChatGPT com níveis crescentes de dificuldade. Assim, você poderá usar o ChatGPT fora da interface, criar um chatbot em outro site ou até mesmo integrar o ChatGPT a outros softwares, como Google Sheets ou Excel, por exemplo.
targetAudiences: Qualquer pessoa que deseje dominar a IA e o ChatGPT. Esta formação é adequada para todos os níveis.

courseDetails.title: Building Video Call App with Javascript, Supabase and WebRTC
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to build video call app using Javascript, HTML, CSS, Socket IO, WebRTC, and Supabase
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Building Video Call App with Javascript, Supabase and WebRTC course. This is a comprehensive project based course where you will learn how to build real time video call applications similar to Zoom and WhatsApp. This course is a perfect combination between web development and WebRTC, making it an ideal opportunity to practice your programming skills while improving your technical knowledge in real time network communication. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of WebRTC, such as getting to know its use cases, technical limitations, and key features. Then, in the next section, you will learn how WebRTC works in a video call app. This section covers the step by step process starting from user media capture, creating a peer connection, signaling to exchange metadata, offer answer exchange, interactive connectivity establishment, establishing peer to peer connection, streaming media, maintaining connection, and handling disconnect. Afterward, in the next section, you will learn about all features that you will build in this project, those features include basic user authentication, realtime video and audio communication, join request host approval, mute and unmute video and audio. Following that, we will start the project, firstly, we will start with the backend, we will build a basic user authentication system and integrate it with Supabase. This feature ensures that only users with the correct email and password can log in which adds a layer of security to the app. Following that, we also will implement Socket IO to handle real-time signaling between users. This feature enables seamless communication between peers by exchanging metadata required to set up and manage video call connections.

Once it has been set up, we will establish the peer to peer connection using WebRTC protocols.

This allows users to directly connect and communicate without relying on a centralized media server, ensuring low latency and high quality streaming. Then, after that, we will create functions to allow users to mute and unmute their audio and video streams during a call.

This feature gives users full control over their communication and privacy throughout the session. Afterward, we will design a clean and user-friendly interface using HTML and CSS.

This ensures the application is easy to use and visually appealing. Lastly, at the end of the course, we will test the video call app using two testing methods, performance testing and functionality testing. By doing so, we will be able to ensure the app runs smoothly under different conditions and all features work as expected.

Before getting into the course, we need to ask this question to ourselves, why should we build a video call app using WebRTC? Well, here is my answer, this project strengthens your understanding of real-time communication and exposes you to the same core technologies used by platforms like Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams. The skills you will learn, for example, setting up peer-to-peer connections, handling signaling, and implementing secure user authentication are not only limited to video call apps. They can also be applied to other projects including live chat systems, live streaming platforms, and E-learning softwares. These are highly in demand skills that open doors to a variety of career paths in tech and media industries.

Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:

  • Learn the basic fundamentals of WebRTC, such as getting to know its use cases, technical limitations, and main features

  • Learn how WebRTC works in a video call app. This section covers user media capture, creating a peer connection, signaling to exchange metadata, offer answer exchange, interactive connectivity establishment, establishing peer to peer connection, streaming media, maintaining connection, and handling disconnect

  • Learn about video call app features like user authentication, real time video and audio communication, join request host approval system, and audio video muting

  • Learn how to build video call app using Socket IO and WebRTC

  • Learn how to install Express JS and Socket IO

  • Learn how to create Socket server and join room logic

  • Learn how to create SDP offer answer exchange using Socket IO

  • Learn how to setup Supabase storage for user authentication

  • Learn how to build basic user authentication system

  • Learn how to create functions for login, signup, and logout

  • Learn how to create functions to start video call and access user media

  • Learn how to create function for joining video call room and structure host approval workflow

  • Learn how to create WebRTC peer connection and send SDP offer

  • Learn how to create functions to handle SDP offer and answer

  • Learn how to create functions to generate meeting room ID, mute audio, and mute video

  • Learn how to design video call app dashboard

  • Learn how to design login and signup page

  • Learn how to style video call app user interface with CSS

  • Learn how to conduct performance and functionality testings
targetAudiences: Software engineers who are interested in building video call app with WebRTC and Socket IO
Tech entrepreneurs who are interested in adding video call features to their apps or softwares

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA Generativa: guía de IA y prompt engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina la IA y el Prompt engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini | El curso esencial de IA generativa
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formación Integral en ChatGPT e IA Generativa

¿Te imaginas empezar cada día con un asistente personal sumamente talentoso, listo para ejecutar tus tareas con una precisión y rapidez insuperables?

Una IA que puede redactar tus correos, artículos o informes, crear imágenes inspiradoras, analizar datos complejos, programar soluciones a medida y resolver innumerables problemas, permitiéndote enfocarte en lo que realmente importa.

Para disfrutar de todos estos beneficios, primero hay que dominar la IA. Muchas personas se entusiasman, realizan un par de comandos y abandonan, sin llegar a descubrir el verdadero potencial de la inteligencia artificial. Este comportamiento suele deberse a la falta de conocimiento sobre las técnicas, métodos y configuraciones que permiten obtener los mejores resultados.

El objetivo de esta formación es proporcionarte todas las herramientas para comunicarte eficazmente con la IA, configurarla de la mejor manera y explotarla al máximo. Para lograrlo, he diseñado un curso conciso y dinámico que te permitirá desarrollar los conocimientos y habilidades esenciales para un uso óptimo de la IA.


Durante esta formación, aprenderás:

  • Formulación de solicitudes claras a la IA: Cómo redactar peticiones precisas para obtener las mejores respuestas posibles.

  • Configuración de ChatGPT: Convertir ChatGPT en tu profesor, cofundador o analista de confianza.

  • Generación de ideas y productividad: Técnicas para generar múltiples ideas y mejorar tu trabajo, aumentando tu productividad, velocidad, relevancia y eficacia.

  • Aprovechamiento de la multimodalidad de ChatGPT: Cómo escribirle, hablarle, escucharlo, enviarle imágenes y pedirle que las interprete.

  • Generación de imágenes con Dall-e y Copilot: Estrategias para obtener las mejores imágenes posibles.

  • Alternativas a la versión de pago de ChatGPT: Cómo encontrar y utilizar opciones interesantes.

  • Exploración de otras IA: Conocer y utilizar otras herramientas como Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Adaptación de ChatGPT a tus necesidades: Personalizar ChatGPT según tus preferencias y necesidades específicas para obtener respuestas a medida.

  • Potenciación de ChatGPT con los GPTs: Uso de aplicaciones GPT y creación de estas, incluso sin ser desarrollador.

  • Temas técnicos avanzados: Gestión de API, uso del playground, e integración de ChatGPT en otros software como Excel o Google Sheets.

  • Accesibilidad para todos: Todo el contenido está diseñado para ser accesible, incluso para principiantes.


En esta formación, encontrarás:

  • Demostraciones concretas: Ejemplos prácticos y casos de uso.

  • Fichas técnicas y guías prácticas: Material descargable para facilitar tu aprendizaje.

[Actualización: He añadido videos sobre el uso del modelo GPT4o que sucede a la versión GPT4]

En resumen, estás a punto de iniciar un curso claro, accesible y atractivo. Está diseñado para cubrir los conceptos esenciales sin extenderse demasiado, ofreciendo el equilibrio perfecto. No importa tu nivel inicial, ya seas principiante o busques técnicas avanzadas, esta es la única formación que necesitarás para dominar ChatGPT.


Mi presentación:

Me llamo Yassine, soy el fundador de una organización de formación que ha ayudado a miles de estudiantes a alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales. Soy un apasionado de la tecnología. Después de obtener un máster en finanzas y adquirir experiencia en consultoría y fondos de inversión, me formé en desarrollo web y dediqué cientos de horas a descubrir y utilizar IA. Hoy quiero transmitirte, de la manera más clara posible, todo lo que he aprendido en estos últimos años.


Certificación y garantía:

  • Al completar esta formación, recibirás una certificación que podrás compartir en LinkedIn.

  • Esta formación es sin riesgo, ya que cuentas con una garantía de "satisfacción o reembolso" de 30 días.

  • Tendrás acceso de por vida a la formación y a los recursos descargables.

Estás a un clic de dominar una tecnología extremadamente útil que te hará más eficiente, más productivo y, simplemente, indispensable. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en IA!



Detalle de las diferentes secciones de este curso:


Introducción rápida a ChatGPT

Descubre cómo dominar rápidamente ChatGPT en solo unos pocos videos. Sumérgete en su interfaz intuitiva y aprende a crear tus primeros comandos para aprovechar al máximo el poder de la IA. Ya sea para generar tablas, hacer lluvias de ideas, generar nuevas ideas, traducir y corregir textos, o redactar diversos contenidos, serás más rápido y eficiente con la IA. Descubre cómo ChatGPT puede asistirte en tu búsqueda de empleo y adaptarse a tus necesidades profesionales para aumentar tu eficacia. Verás que ChatGPT es capaz de crear una multitud de contenidos, desde correos y cartas hasta artículos y publicaciones para redes sociales, sin olvidar la redacción de código informático.

Fundamentos del prompt engineering

Aprende por qué el prompt engineering es esencial y cómo puede transformar a ChatGPT en un verdadero experto. Comprende la importancia del contexto y los objetivos para estructurar tus interacciones, y descubre cómo ajustar el formato y la temperatura para optimizar tus comandos y variar el nivel de creatividad del modelo. Personaliza tus interacciones dominando el tono y el estilo, y benefíciate de 5 consejos prácticos para obtener respuestas aún más pertinentes de ChatGPT.

Técnicas avanzadas de prompt engineering

En esta sección, veremos cómo crear comandos que generen otros comandos. Estudiaremos la metodología de reverse engineering, las funcionalidades de búsqueda web, la interpretación de imágenes y muchas otras técnicas avanzadas.

Dall-e

Continuaremos con la generación de imágenes con Dall-e. Verás cómo pasar de un resultado promedio a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, cómo modificar de manera simple y rápida porciones de imágenes y optimizar tus resultados. También estudiaremos técnicas avanzadas que te permitirán, por ejemplo, crear una continuidad en la generación de un personaje de ficción o cómic, para obtener resultados aún más impresionantes.

Soluciones a las limitaciones de ChatGPT y la IA

ChatGPT y otros modelos de inteligencia artificial tienen límites y debilidades. En esta sección, exploraremos cuáles son y cómo superarlas.

Funcionalidades interesantes en ChatGPT

Aprende a configurar las funcionalidades de compartir tus conversaciones para un uso colaborativo de ChatGPT. Aprovecha al máximo la aplicación móvil de ChatGPT explorando todas las opciones que ofrece. Finalmente, descubre métodos para crear contenido único con la IA evitando cualquier forma de plagio o contenido duplicado.

Copilot y Bing

Copilot ofrece varias alternativas interesantes a las funcionalidades avanzadas y de pago de ChatGPT. Veremos cómo aprovechar la colaboración entre Microsoft y OpenAI para acceder a funcionalidades avanzadas de inteligencia artificial integradas en el motor de búsqueda Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral y otros

En la continuidad de la sección anterior, estudiaremos otras IA como Gemini de Google o Claude de Anthropic. Veremos sus fortalezas, debilidades y analizaremos varios casos de uso para saber en qué situaciones es preferible utilizarlas en lugar de ChatGPT.

Instrucciones personalizadas en ChatGPT

Adapta ChatGPT a tus necesidades y expectativas. Aprende a personalizar tus interacciones configurando tus instrucciones personalizadas. Descubre también los puntos de precaución a considerar para un uso óptimo.

Los GPTs

Descubre el funcionamiento de los GPTs, esas mini aplicaciones hiperespecializadas que a veces pueden superar a ChatGPT. Aprende a crear tu propio GPT paso a paso. Domina las llamadas a la API para maximizar las capacidades de ChatGPT y descubre al final de esta sección cómo monetizar tus GPTs y, en general, cómo ganar dinero gracias a ChatGPT.

Gestión de API y Playground

Explora el playground de ChatGPT y descubre las nuevas funcionalidades que ofrece. Aprende a hacer llamadas a la API de ChatGPT con niveles de dificultad crecientes. Así, podrás utilizar ChatGPT fuera de la interfaz, crear un chatbot en otro sitio o incluso integrar ChatGPT en otros software como Google Sheets o Excel, por ejemplo.
targetAudiences: A cualquier persona que desee dominar la IA y ChatGPT. Esta formación es para todos los niveles.

If you are focusing on academic writing or business writing, having proper knowledge of English punctuation and English grammar is a must. Initially, we'll introduce you to all the punctuation you need to know while writing English.


Terminal points in English sentences signify the end point of independent clauses. You may express the depth of a statement with breaks or pauses and highlight any significant points with brackets. With our course, you'll learn how and when to use punctuation correctly to express thoughts in sentences.


Additionally, you will learn how to use apostrophes, dashes, slashes, and connectors to separate and join different letters, phrases, and clauses. You will also learn when to use quotes.


As you go along, you'll study about punctuation in academic writing, creative writing, journalism, and technical writing. This is because different genres require distinct writing styles.


We are not done yet; by following our course guidelines, you will learn to effectively use punctuation in memos and business communications and write with good English grammar and punctuation.


So let's not pass up the opportunity to master the use of English punctuation with our special English Punctuation Simplified course. Enroll Right Away!


This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. Introduction to English Punctuation: We will cover English punctuation in detail in this part, including its types, history, significance, usage, mistakes, and pauses. It makes a sentence's meaning more evident.

  2. Terminal Points: Terminal points in English sentences signify the end of independent clauses. In this section, we explain how terminal points, such as question marks, exclamation points, and full stops, clarify a sentence's meaning.

  3. Punctuation for Breaks or Pauses: This section will go over the usage of English punctuation, such as colons, semicolons, and commas, as pauses or breaks in sentences. Consequently, you will learn how to punctuate breaks.

  4. Information on Parenthesis and Brackets: This section will go over the many kinds of brackets, such as square or round brackets, and why they are necessary in English writing. You will have a firm grasp of the functions of brackets by this section.

  5. Connectors and Dividers: This section will explain the functions of hyphens, dashes, slashes, and apostrophes as connectors or dividers between various letters, words, phrases, or clauses in all types of writing.

  6. Quotes Material: Quote materials are used to write quotes or any notes in academic writing and business writing. You will learn specifically how to use quotation marks, ellipses, and their spheres of application in this section of our English Punctuation Simplified course.

  7. Other Signs and Symbols: In addition to English punctuation, other signals are used as well. They are crucial for delivering information and other curriculum. The purposes of various signs and symbols will be covered in this section.

  8. A Review on Abbreviations: You will understand every aspect of the abbreviations here. To provide you with a thorough understanding, this section will go over these abbreviations in detail.

  9. Punctuation in Different Types of Writing: This section aims to familiarize you with the many forms of English Writingand how punctuation can be applied to each. Besides tips and advice, you will learn how punctuation plays a significant role in communicating clarity and accuracy in technical and academic writing.

  10. Punctuation in Professional Communication: This section will teach you how important punctuation is in business writing. This lesson will give you the skills and information to make your business emails, memoranda, and report writing more effective and efficient.

  11. The Uses of Capitalisation: This section of the English Punctuation Simplified course will teach you the importance of capitalization in English Writing. You will learn how to use capitalization effectively to communicate your ideas clearly and accurately by the end of this course.

  12. Common Errors While Using Specific Punctuation: This section helps learners avoid clear punctuation errors. By the end of this course, you will be able to recognize and fix mistakes, such as poorly used commas, apostrophes, and semicolons, as well as properly used quote symbols.

- Comment pousser Dall-e ou Copilot à générer les meilleures images possibles.

- Comment trouver des alternatives intéressantes à la version payante de ChatGPT.

- On va également explorer d’autres IA comme Copilot, Claude ou Gemini.

- On verra comment adapter ChatGPT à vos préférences et besoins spécifiques pour des réponses sur mesure.

- On va voir comment booster ChatGPT grâce aux GPTs : comment utiliser ces applications et même comment les créer sans être développeur.

- On va aussi explorer des sujets un peu plus techniques en fin de formation comme la gestion des API, le playground, l’intégration de ChatGPT sur d’autres logiciels comme Excel ou Google sheets par exemple.

- Et surtout on verra que tout ça est accessible à tous, même aux débutants.


Dans cette formation, vous trouverez :

  • Des démonstrations concrètes.

  • Des fiches techniques et guides pratiques téléchargeables.

  • Et surtout un contenu régulièrement mis à jour


En bref, vous vous apprêtez à suivre un cours clair, accessible et engageant. Assez détaillé pour couvrir les notions essentielles sans traîner en longueur. Peu importe votre niveau de départ que vous soyez débutant ou à la recherche de techniques avancées, c’est la seule formation dont vous aurez besoin pour maîtriser ChatGPT.


Qui suis-je ?

Je m’appelle Yassine Rochd, je suis le fondateur d’un organisme de formation qui a aidé des milliers d’apprenants à atteindre leurs objectifs professionnels.

Je suis également passionné par la technologie. Après un master en finance et des expériences en conseil et en fonds d’investissement, j'ai suivi une formation en développement web et passé des centaines d’heures à découvrir et utiliser des IA.

Aujourd’hui, je souhaite vous transmettre le plus clairement possible ce que j’ai appris ces dernières années.


Certification et garantie :

- En terminant cette formation, vous recevrez une certification que vous pourrez même partager sur LinkedIn.

- Cette formation est également sans risque puisque vous bénéficiez d’une garantie « satisfait ou remboursé » de 30 jours.

- Vous bénéficiez d’un accès à vie à la formation, aux ressources téléchargeables et aux futures mises à jour


Vous êtes à un clic de maîtriser une technologie extrêmement utile qui vous rendra plus efficace, plus productif, et tout simplement incontournable.



Détail des différentes sections de ce cours sur ChatGPT et l'IA :


I. Prise en main rapide de ChatGPT

Découvrez comment maîtriser rapidement ChatGPT en seulement quelques vidéos. Plongez dans l'interface intuitive de ChatGPT et apprenez à créer vos premiers prompts pour exploiter pleinement la puissance de l'IA. Que ce soit pour générer des tableaux, brainstormer, générer des idées, traduire et corriger des textes, ou encore rédiger des contenus variés, vous irez plus vite et serez plus performant avec l’IA. Découvrez comment ChatGPT peut vous assister dans votre recherche d'emploi et s'adapter à vos besoins professionnels pour accroître votre efficacité. Vous verrez que ChatGPT est capable de créer une multitude de contenus, allant des mails et lettres aux articles et posts pour les réseaux sociaux, sans oublier la rédaction de code informatique.


II. Les bases du prompt engineering

Apprenez pourquoi le prompt engineering est essentiel et comment il peut transformer ChatGPT en véritable expert. Comprenez l'importance du contexte et des objectifs pour structurer vos interactions, et découvrez comment ajuster le format et la température pour optimiser vos prompts et varier le niveau de créativité du modèle. Personnalisez vos interactions en maîtrisant le ton et le style, et bénéficiez de 5 conseils pratiques pour obtenir des réponses encore plus pertinentes de ChatGPT.

III. techniques avancées de prompt engineering

Dans cette section, on verra comment créer des prompts qui génèrent eux-mêmes d'autres prompts. On étudiera la méthode du reverse engineering, les fonctionnalités de recherche web, d’interprétation d’images et encore plein d’autres techniques avancées.


IV. Dall-e

On enchainera sur la génération d’images avec Dall-e. Vous verrez comment passer d’un résultat très moyen à des œuvres esthétiques et inspirantes, comment modifier simplement et rapidement des portions d'images et optimiser vos résultats. On étudiera également des techniques avancées qui vous permettront par exemple de créer une continuité dans la génération d’un personnage de fiction ou de bande dessinée, pour des résultats encore plus impressionnants.


V. Les solutions aux limites de ChatGPT et de l’IA

ChatGPT et les autres modèles d’intelligence artificielle présentent des limites et des faiblesses. On verra dans cette section quelles sont-elles et comment les surmonter.


VI. Fonctionnalités intéressantes sur ChatGPT

Apprenez à paramétrer les fonctionnalités de partage de vos conversations pour une utilisation collaborative de ChatGPT. Exploitez au mieux l’application mobile Chat GPT, en explorant toutes les options qu'elle offre. Enfin, découvrez les méthodes pour créer un contenu unique avec l’IA en évitant toute forme de plagiat ou contenu dupliqué.


VII. Copilot et Bing

Copilot propose plusieurs alternatives intéressantes à des fonctionnalités payantes et avancées de ChatGPT. On verra comment profiter du partenariat entre Microsoft et OpenAI pour accéder à des fonctionnalités avancées d’intelligence artificielle intégrées au moteur de recherche Bing.


VIII. Gemini, Claude, Mistral et les autres

Dans la continuité de la section précédente, on étudiera d’autres IA comme Gemini de Google ou Claude d’Anthropique. On verra leur force, leur faiblesse et on étudiera plusieurs cas d’utilisation pour savoir dans quel cas les préférer à ChatGPT.


IX. Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Adaptez ChatGPT à vos besoins et à vos attentes. Apprenez à personnaliser vos interactions en configurant vos custom instructions. Découvrez également les points de vigilance à considérer pour une utilisation optimale.


X. Les GPTs

Découvrez le fonctionnement des GPTs, ces mini applications hyperspécialisées qui peuvent parfois dépasser ChatGPT. Apprenez à créer votre propre GPT étape par étape. Maîtrisez les appels d’API pour maximiser les capacités de ChatGPT et découvrez même en fin de section comment monétiser vos GPTs et, plus largement, comment gagner de l'argent grâce à ChatGPT.


XI. Gestion d’API & Playground

Explorez le playground de ChatGPT et découvrez les nouvelles fonctionnalités qu'il offre. Apprenez à appeler l'API de ChatGPT avec des niveaux de difficulté croissants. Vous pourrez ainsi utiliser ChatGPT en dehors de l'interface, créer un chatbot sur un autre site ou même intégrer ChatGPT à d'autres logiciels comme Google Sheets ou Excel, par exemple.

courseDetails.longDescription:
If you are interested in finance careers, such as Private Equity, M&A, financial controling or financial management, you've likely realized that one key skill is indispensable across all these finance fields: it's financial modeling.

Financial modeling is the cornerstone of finance, underpinning essential tasks such as developing Business Plans, generating reports in Excel, and valuing companies. The ability to create reliable and well-structured financial models is therefore crucial if you aim to pursue a career in corporate finance.

This is why many job interviews include technical cases on Excel. Within 30 minutes to an hour, employers can assess candidates by providing them with a computer and specific instructions, effectively identifying the top 10% who excel in financial modeling.

This comprehensive finance course on Excel will provide you with the knowledge, techniques, and best practices to create clear, well-structured models that meet the high standards of investment banks, Private Equity firms and financial management teams.

In this training, you will learn the standards and rules of financial modeling to produce professional, rigorous, optimized, and error-free outputs. You will be guided through designing a complete financial model with various investment and development scenarios for a company, including a debt schedule with multiple financing tranches, a Sources and Uses table, a clear Business Plan, and valuation using the transaction comparables method based on a normative EBITDA. Finally, we will calculate the IRR and analyze it according to investment exit parameters.

If these concepts are unfamiliar to you, we will cover them before diving into financial modeling in Excel. This course revisits essential finance fundamentals and the necessary knowledge you must master if you are interested in financial controlling, financial analysis, or transactional careers (PE, M&A, TS).

Instructor Introduction:

My name is Yassine, and I am the founder of a corporate finance training organization that has helped thousands of students and recent graduates prepare for interviews in Private Equity, investment banking, and consulting firms in Transaction Services, Valuation, and Financial Restructuring.

I am also a former Associate in Private Equity, having worked for two years in two different investment funds in Paris on small-cap operations across various sectors, including hospitality and real estate, tech and media, and renewable energy.

Additionally, I was a senior consultant in Valuation and Financial Modeling at EY, where I worked on multiple financial models in transactional contexts and investment projects.

Besides, we will help you assess the current trends in retail management so you can update your retail management strategy accordingly with a changing pattern.

As you progress with our course, you will gain all relevant knowledge to execute your operation in retail management, including retail strategy and planning based on situation analysis, identifying potential consumers, and making a foolproof strategy based on the analysis.

Furthermore, we will discuss and guide you in retail pricing and merchandising, which greatly influence the profit of your retail business. In that context, we will discuss pricing elasticity; understanding this topic will help you figure out consumer perception and set a price to give you back the maximum profit. Moreover, you will learn how to calculate markup and margins in retail management, which are key factors in business profitability and success.

Start your journey with our Retail Management 101 course and showcase your potential in retailing.

This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. Introduction to Retail Management: This section will discuss the fundamentals of retail management. You will understand what retailing is and the importance of staying up to date with retail business trends and job prospects in retail management.

  2. Retail Strategy and Planning: In this part of our retail management course, we will teach you how to plan out a practical strategy to maximize the output of your retail business.

  3. Retail Pricing and Merchandising: This section examines the basics of retail pricing and merchandising, including how retailers decide price strategies, calculate markup and profits, use promotional pricing to attract customers, and lots more.
